's Strategic Initiatives in 2011 Are Mobile Business Review, guest contributor Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google Inc. , writes about the company's plans for the coming year, saying as I think about Google Inc. 's strategic initiatives in 2011, I realize they're all about mobile. It's notable that Eric Schmidt didn't say "mostly," or "many," of its initiatives are about mobile- he said "all" of them are. While Troy Aikman has been impressed by both Aaron Rodgers and Ben Roethlisberger this season, he gave credit to another standout quarterback, the Eagles' Michael Vick . at Mr. Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq. " Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody," Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes. Nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie.[ CIA Director President Bush ] Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Even so, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld -- who does reveal that former President Bush asked for Iraq invasion plans within days of 9/11-- argues that removing Saddam Hussein was the right thing to do.
